wanda-chat-welcometext: Welcome message displayed in the chatbot
wanda-chat-welcomedesc: Description message to the user, displayed in the chatbot
wanda-chat-instruction1: Instruction shown to the user in the chatbot
wanda-chat-instruction2: Instruction shown to the user in the chatbot
wanda-chat-pdftotext-error: Error message to notify the user that there is a problem with a utility setup
wanda-floating-chat-title: Tooltip text for the floating chat button
wanda-api-error-empty-question: Error message when user submits an empty question
wanda-api-error-question-too-long: Error message when user's question exceeds character limit
wanda-api-error-config-invalid: Error message when the chat service is not properly configured
wanda-api-error-no-index: Error message when no Elasticsearch index is found
wanda-api-error-no-results: Error message when no relevant information is found in the wiki
wanda-api-error-generation-failed: Error message when LLM response generation fails
wanda-api-error-openai-key: Error message when OpenAI API key is not configured
wanda-api-error-anthropic-key: Error message when Anthropic API key is not configured
wanda-api-error-azure-key: Error message when Azure API key is not configured
wanda-api-error-gemini-key: Error message when Gemini (Google Generative Language) API key is not configured
wanda-api-error-fallback: Default fallback message when LLM cannot provide a response
